metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000345 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DHIES/ECIES CBC mode vulnerable to padding oracle attack. For BC 1.55 and older, in an environment where timings can be easily observed, it is possible with enough observations to identify when the decryption is failing due to padding.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
